ygData.subject: Re: Level Cap  & Gemcutter
ygData.msgSnippet: well, if you can find out where to find diamond dust, that would make the process for creating the gemcutter s tool much easier. Talast Level 29 Gnome Mage
ygData.messageBody:
well, if you can find out where to find diamond dust, that would make the
process for creating the gemcutter's tool much easier.

Talast
Level 29 Gnome Mage
Test Server
-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Del Castillo <peemk@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 9:44 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Level Cap & Gemcutter


>Well from speculations. Tinker..seem to have a "Spell Research" level
caps.
> Other Trade Skills does not seem to have level cap. Fishing has a Level
>Cap similar to Melee level cap (Level*5)+5...
>
>Spell Research seem to follow...level 16=50...then +5 on every level there
>after. (anyone know the actual formula?)
>
>Bertoxx server
>
>Another thing found, I was checking out the guy (dwarf) that give out the
>quest for Dragon Scale Armor in Rathe Mtn. (Inn near the Lake Rathe zone).
>Well, there's a gnome next to him who sell gems..(never seen him before).
>IF you hail this gnome, he talk about better stones and stones cutting (gem
>cutting). Well that seem to relate to the new tinker item GEM Cutter. So
>any info, you guys can give...(He won't say much about it.)
>
>-Untos Gnomish Enchanter.
>
>
